Package comp1206.sushi.server

Class ServerWindow

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • javax.swing.JFrame
              • comp1206.sushi.server.ServerWindow
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UpdateListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants
    public class ServerWindow
extends javax.swing.JFrame
implements UpdateListener
    Provides the Sushi Server user interface You should not need to modify this class if your implementation of the interface is correct.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  ServerWindow.ConfigurationPanel  
      class  ServerWindow.DualPanel<T>
      A dual panel display which shows data at the top and allows adding new models at the bottom
      class  ServerWindow.EditorPanel<T>
      Editor panel which displays a set of captions and fields
      class  ServerWindow.IngredientFrame
      Window to edit ingredient restocking levels
      class  ServerWindow.RecipeFrame
      Recipe editor frame, which allows editing the recipe components and restocking amounts
      class  ServerWindow.ResultsPanel<T>
      Display a panel of results using a JTable linked to a datasource and particular class Public getters of that model will become automatic visible columns.
      class  ServerWindow.ResultsTable<T>
      Provides the results model to drive a JTable based on the provided data sources
